00160    // template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T,

00181 
00182    template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T& t, 
00183    Vector<double>& x, Vector<double>& y,  
00184    double (T::*f)(double, double), 
00185    double a, double b, double ya) 
00186    {
00187       // Integration step
00188 
00189       double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00190 
00191       // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00192 
00193       Vector<double> k(4);
00194 
00195       // Independent variable
00196 
00197       x[0] = a;
00198 
00199       for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00200       {
00201          x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00202      }
00203 
00204       x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00205 
00206       // Dependent variable
00207 
00208       y[0] = ya;
00209 
00210       for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00211       {
00212          // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00213 
00214          k[0] = (t.*f)(x[i], y[i]);
00215          k[1] = (t.*f)(x[i]+h/2.0, y[i]+h*k[0]/2.0);
00216          k[2] = (t.*f)(x[i]+h/2.0, y[i]+h*k[1]/2.0);
00217          k[3] = (t.*f)(x[i+1], y[i]+h*k[2]);
00218 
00219          // Dependent variable derivative
00220 
00221          y[i+1] = y[i] + h*(k[0] + 2.0*k[1] + 2.0*k[2] + k[3])/6.0;
00222       }
00223    }

00226    // template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T, 
00227    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00228    // double (T::*f1)(double, double, double), 
00229    // double (T::*f2)(double, double, double), 
00230    // double, double, double, double, int) method 
00231 
00253 
00254    template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T& t, 
00255    Vector<double>& x, Vector<double>& y1, Vector<double>& y2, 
00256    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double), 
00257    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double), 
00258    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a) 
00259    {
00260       // Integration step
00261 
00262       double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00263 
00264       // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00265 
00266       Vector<double> k1(4);
00267       Vector<double> k2(4);
00268 
00269       // Independent variable
00270 
00271       x[0] = a;
00272 
00273       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00274       {
00275          x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00276      }
00277 
00278       x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00279 
00280       // Dependent variables
00281 
00282       y1[0] = y1a;
00283       y2[0] = y2a;
00284 
00285       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00286       {
00287          // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00288 
00289          k1[0] = (t.*f1)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i]);
00290          k2[0] = (t.*f2)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i]);
00291 
00292          k1[1] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0);
00293          k2[1] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0);
00294 
00295          k1[2] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0);
00296          k2[2] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0);
00297 
00298          k1[3] = (t.*f1)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2]);
00299          k2[3] = (t.*f2)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2]);
00300 
00301          // Dependent variables
00302 
00303          y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00304          y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00305       }
00306    }

00343    template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T& t, 
00344    Vector<double>& x, Vector<double>& y1, Vector<double>& y2, Vector<double>& y3, 
00345    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double), 
00346    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double), 
00347    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double), 
00348    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a)
00349    {
00350       // Integration step
00351 
00352       double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00353 
00354       // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00355 
00356       Vector<double> k1(4);
00357       Vector<double> k2(4);
00358       Vector<double> k3(4);
00359 
00360       // Independent variable
00361 
00362       x[0] = a;
00363 
00364       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00365       {
00366          x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00367       }
00368 
00369       x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00370 
00371       // Dependent variables
00372 
00373       y1[0] = y1a;
00374       y2[0] = y2a;
00375       y3[0] = y3a;
00376 
00377 
00378       for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00379       {
00380          // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00381 
00382          k1[0] = (t.*f1)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00383          k2[0] = (t.*f2)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00384          k3[0] = (t.*f3)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i]);
00385 
00386          k1[1] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00387          k2[1] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00388          k3[1] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0);
00389 
00390          k1[2] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00391          k2[2] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00392          k3[2] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0);
00393 
00394          k1[3] = (t.*f1)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00395          k2[3] = (t.*f2)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00396          k3[3] = (t.*f3)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2]);
00397 
00398          // Dependent variables
00399 
00400          y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00401          y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00402          y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00403       }

00446    
00447    template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T& t, 
00448    Vector<double>& x, 
00449    Vector<double>& y1, 
00450    Vector<double>& y2, 
00451    Vector<double>& y3, 
00452    Vector<double>& y4, 
00453    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00454    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00455    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00456    double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00457    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a)
00458    {
00459       // Integration step
00460 
00461       double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00462 
00463       // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00464 
00465       Vector<double> k1(4);
00466       Vector<double> k2(4);
00467       Vector<double> k3(4);
00468       Vector<double> k4(4);
00469 
00470       // Independent variable
00471 
00472       x[0] = a;
00473 
00474       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00475       {
00476          x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00477       }
00478 
00479       x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00480 
00481       // Dependent variables
00482 
00483       y1[0] = y1a;
00484       y2[0] = y2a;
00485       y3[0] = y3a;
00486       y4[0] = y4a;
00487 
00488       for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00489       {
00490          // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00491 
00492          k1[0] = (t.*f1)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00493          k2[0] = (t.*f2)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00494          k3[0] = (t.*f3)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00495          k4[0] = (t.*f4)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i]);
00496 
00497          k1[1] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00498          k2[1] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00499          k3[1] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00500          k4[1] = (t.*f4)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0);
00501 
00502          k1[2] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00503          k2[2] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00504          k3[2] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00505          k4[2] = (t.*f4)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0);
00506 
00507          k1[3] = (t.*f1)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00508          k2[3] = (t.*f2)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00509          k3[3] = (t.*f3)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00510          k4[3] = (t.*f4)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2]);
00511 
00512          // Dependent variables
00513 
00514          y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00515          y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00516          y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00517          y4[i+1] = y4[i] + h*(k4[0] + 2.0*k4[1] + 2.0*k4[2] + k4[3])/6.0;
00518       }   
00519    }

00565    
00566    template<class T> void getRungeKuttaIntegral(T& t, 
00567    Vector<double>& x, 
00568    Vector<double>& y1, 
00569    Vector<double>& y2, 
00570    Vector<double>& y3, 
00571    Vector<double>& y4, 
00572    Vector<double>& y5, 
00573    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00574    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00575    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00576    double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00577    double (T::*f5)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
00578    double a, double b, 
00579    double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a, double y5a)
00580    {
00581       // Integration step
00582 
00583       double h = (b-a)/(numberOfPoints-1.0);      
00584 
00585       // Fourth order Runge-Kutta coefficients
00586 
00587       Vector<double> k1(4);
00588       Vector<double> k2(4);
00589       Vector<double> k3(4);
00590       Vector<double> k4(4);
00591       Vector<double> k5(4);
00592 
00593       // Independent variable
00594 
00595       x[0] = a;
00596 
00597       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints-2; i++)
00598       {
00599          x[i+1] = x[i] + h;
00600       }
00601 
00602       x[numberOfPoints-1] = b;
00603 
00604       // Dependent variables
00605 
00606       y1[0] = y1a;
00607       y2[0] = y2a;
00608       y3[0] = y3a;
00609       y4[0] = y4a;
00610       y5[0] = y5a;
00611 
00612       for(int i = 0;  i < numberOfPoints-1; i++)
00613       {     
00614          // Runge-Kutta coefficients
00615 
00616          k1[0] = (t.*f1)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00617          k2[0] = (t.*f2)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00618          k3[0] = (t.*f3)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00619          k4[0] = (t.*f4)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00620          k5[0] = (t.*f5)(x[i], y1[i], y2[i], y3[i], y4[i], y5[i]);
00621 
00622          k1[1] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00623          k2[1] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00624          k3[1] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00625          k4[1] = (t.*f4)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00626          k5[1] = (t.*f5)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[0]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[0]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[0]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[0]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[0]/2.0);
00627 
00628          k1[2] = (t.*f1)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00629          k2[2] = (t.*f2)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00630          k3[2] = (t.*f3)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00631          k4[2] = (t.*f4)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00632          k5[2] = (t.*f5)(x[i]+h/2.0, y1[i]+h*k1[1]/2.0, y2[i]+h*k2[1]/2.0, y3[i]+h*k3[1]/2.0, y4[i]+h*k4[1]/2.0, y5[i]+h*k5[1]/2.0);
00633 
00634          k1[3] = (t.*f1)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00635          k2[3] = (t.*f2)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00636          k3[3] = (t.*f3)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00637          k4[3] = (t.*f4)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00638          k5[3] = (t.*f5)(x[i+1], y1[i]+h*k1[2], y2[i]+h*k2[2], y3[i]+h*k3[2], y4[i]+h*k4[2], y5[i]+h*k5[2]);
00639 
00640          // Dependent variables
00641 
00642          y1[i+1] = y1[i] + h*(k1[0] + 2.0*k1[1] + 2.0*k1[2] + k1[3])/6.0;
00643          y2[i+1] = y2[i] + h*(k2[0] + 2.0*k2[1] + 2.0*k2[2] + k2[3])/6.0;
00644          y3[i+1] = y3[i] + h*(k3[0] + 2.0*k3[1] + 2.0*k3[2] + k3[3])/6.0;
00645          y4[i+1] = y4[i] + h*(k4[0] + 2.0*k4[1] + 2.0*k4[2] + k4[3])/6.0;
00646          y5[i+1] = y5[i] + h*(k5[0] + 2.0*k5[1] + 2.0*k5[2] + k5[3])/6.0;
00647       }
00648    }
00649 
00650    // template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T, 
00651    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00652    // double (T::*f)(double, double), 
00653    // double, double, double, double, int) method
00654  
00671 
00672    template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
00673    Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& yOut,  
00674    double (T::*f)(double, double), 
00675    double a, double b, double ya)
00676    {
00677       int count = 0;
00678       int size = initialSize;
00679 
00680       Vector<double> tempX(size);
00681       Vector<double> tempY(size);
00682 
00683       tempX[0] = a;
00684       tempY[0] = ya;
00685 
00686       count++;
00687 
00688       double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00689 
00690       double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
00691       double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
00692       double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
00693       double a5 = 1.0;
00694       double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
00695 
00696       double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
00697       double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
00698       double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
00699       double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
00700       double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
00701       double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
00702       double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
00703       double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
00704       double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
00705       double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
00706       double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
00707       double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
00708       double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
00709       double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
00710       double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
00711 
00712       double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
00713       double c42 = 0.0;
00714       double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
00715       double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
00716       double c45 = 0.0;
00717       double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
00718 
00719       double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
00720       double c52 = 0.0;  
00721       double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
00722       double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
00723       double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
00724       double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
00725 
00726       double d1 = c41 - c51;
00727       double d2 = c42 - c52;
00728       double d3 = c43 - c53;
00729       double d4 = c44 - c54;
00730       double d5 = c45 - c55;
00731       double d6 = c46 - c56;
00732 
00733       double k11 = 0.0;
00734       double k12 = 0.0;
00735       double k13 = 0.0;
00736       double k14 = 0.0;
00737       double k15 = 0.0;
00738       double k16 = 0.0;
00739 
00740       // Main loop
00741 
00742       double x = a;
00743       double y = ya;
00744 
00745       double error = 0.0;
00746 
00747       double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00748 
00749       double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
00750 
00751       while(x < b)
00752       {   
00753          // Set smallest allowable stepsize
00754 
00755          hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00756 
00757          if(h < hmin)
00758          {
00759             if(display)
00760          {
00761                std::cout << std::endl
00762                          << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
00763                          << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00764                          << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
00765                          << std::endl;
00766          }
00767 
00768             h = hmin;
00769          }
00770 
00771          if(x + h > b)
00772          {
00773             h = b - x;
00774          }
00775 
00776          // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
00777 
00778          k11 = h*(t.*f)(x, y);
00779 
00780          k12 = h*(t.*f)(x+a2*h, y+b21*k11);
00781 
00782          k13 = h*(t.*f)(x+a3*h, y+b31*k11+b32*k12);
00783 
00784          k14 = h*(t.*f)(x+a4*h, y+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13); 
00785 
00786          k15 = h*(t.*f)(x+a5*h, y+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14); 
00787 
00788          k16 = h*(t.*f)(x+a6*h, y+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15);
00789 
00790          // Error estimate
00791 
00792          error = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
00793 
00794          if(error <= tolerance) 
00795          {
00796             // Successful step
00797 
00798             x += h;
00799 
00800             y += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
00801 
00802             tempX[count] = x;
00803             tempY[count] = y;
00804 
00805             count++;
00806 
00807             if(error != 0.0)
00808             {
00809                h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
00810             }
00811 
00812             // Computer's memory stuff
00813 
00814             if(count >= size)
00815             {
00816                size *= 2;
00817 
00818                // Control sentence
00819                               
00820                if(size > errorSize)
00821                {
00822                   std::cerr << std::endl
00823                             << "Flood Error: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
00824                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00825                             << "Step size is bigger than greatest allowable." << std::endl;
00826                             
00827                   exit(1);
00828                }
00829                else if(display && (size > warningSize))
00830                {
00831                   std::cout << std::endl
00832                             << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
00833                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00834                             << "Size is " << size << std::endl;
00835                }
00836                 
00837                tempX.resize(size); 
00838                tempY.resize(size);               
00839             }
00840          }
00841          else
00842          {
00843             // Failed step 
00844 
00845             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
00846          }
00847 
00848       } // end while loop    
00849 
00850       Vector<double> newX(count);
00851       Vector<double> newY(count);
00852 
00853       for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
00854       {
00855          newX[i] = tempX[i];
00856          newY[i] = tempY[i];
00857       }
00858 
00859       xOut = newX;
00860       yOut = newY;
00861 
00862       return(count);
00863    }
00864 
00865    // template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T, 
00866    // Vector<double>&, 
00867    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00868    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
00869    // double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00870    // double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
00871    // double, double, double, double, double, double, int) method
00872  
00894 
00895    template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
00896    Vector<double>& xOut, Vector<double>& y1Out, Vector<double>& y2Out, 
00897    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double), 
00898    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double), 
00899    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a)
00900    {
00901       double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0;
00902 
00903       int count = 0;
00904       int size = initialSize;
00905 
00906       Vector<double> tempX(size);
00907       Vector<double> tempY1(size);
00908       Vector<double> tempY2(size);
00909 
00910       tempX[0] = a;
00911       tempY1[0] = y1a;
00912       tempY2[0] = y2a;
00913       count++;
00914 
00915       double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00916 
00917       double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
00918       double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
00919       double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
00920       double a5 = 1.0;
00921       double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
00922 
00923       double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
00924       double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
00925       double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
00926       double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
00927       double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
00928       double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
00929       double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
00930       double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
00931       double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
00932       double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
00933       double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
00934       double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
00935       double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
00936       double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
00937       double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
00938 
00939       double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
00940       double c42 = 0.0;
00941       double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
00942       double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
00943       double c45 = 0.0;
00944       double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
00945 
00946       double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
00947       double c52 = 0.0;  
00948       double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
00949       double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
00950       double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
00951       double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
00952 
00953       double d1 = c41 - c51;
00954       double d2 = c42 - c52;
00955       double d3 = c43 - c53;
00956       double d4 = c44 - c54;
00957       double d5 = c45 - c55;
00958       double d6 = c46 - c56;
00959 
00960       double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0;
00961       double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0;
00962       double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0;
00963       double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0;
00964       double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0;
00965       double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0;
00966 
00967       // Main loop
00968 
00969       double x = a;
00970       double y1 = y1a;
00971       double y2 = y2a;
00972 
00973       double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00974 
00975       double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
00976 
00977       while(x < b)
00978       {   
00979          // Set smallest allowable stepsize
00980 
00981          hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
00982 
00983          if(h < hmin)
00984          {
00985             std::cout << std::endl
00986                       << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
00987                       << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
00988                       << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
00989                       << std::endl;
00990 
00991             h = hmin;
00992          }
00993 
00994          if(x + h > b)
00995          {
00996             h = b - x;
00997          }
00998 
00999          // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01000 
01001          k11 = h*(t.*f1)(x, y1, y2);
01002          k21 = h*(t.*f2)(x, y1, y2);
01003 
01004          k12 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01005          k22 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01006 
01007          k13 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01008          k23 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01009 
01010          k14 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01011          k24 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01012 
01013          k15 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14,
01014          y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01015          k25 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, 
01016          y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01017 
01018          k16 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, 
01019          y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01020          k26 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, 
01021          y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01022 
01023          // Error estimate
01024 
01025          error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01026          error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01027 
01028          error = 0.0;
01029 
01030          if(error1 > error)
01031          {
01032             error = error1;
01033          }
01034          if(error2 > error)
01035          {
01036             error = error2;
01037          }
01038 
01039          if(error <= tolerance)
01040          {
01041             x += h;
01042 
01043             y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01044             y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01045 
01046             tempX[count] = x;
01047             tempY1[count] = y1;
01048             tempY2[count] = y2;
01049 
01050             count++;
01051 
01052             if(error != 0.0)
01053             {
01054                h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01055             }
01056 
01057             if(count >= size)
01058             {
01059                size *= 2;
01060 
01061                if(size > errorSize)
01062                {
01063                   std::cerr << std::endl
01064                             << "Flood Error: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01065                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01066                             << "Step size is bigger than greatest allowable." << std::endl;
01067                             
01068                   exit(1);
01069                }
01070                else if(display && (size > warningSize))
01071                {
01072                   std::cout << std::endl
01073                             << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01074                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01075                             << "Size is " << size << std::endl;
01076                }
01077 
01078                tempX.resize(size);
01079                tempY1.resize(size);
01080                tempY2.resize(size);
01081             }
01082          }
01083          else
01084          {
01085             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
01086          }
01087       } // end while loop   
01088 
01089       Vector<double> newX(count);
01090       Vector<double> newY1(count);
01091       Vector<double> newY2(count);
01092 
01093       for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01094       {
01095          newX[i] = tempX[i];
01096          newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01097          newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01098       }
01099 
01100       xOut = newX;
01101       y1Out = newY1;
01102       y2Out = newY2;
01103 
01104      return(count);
01105    }
01106 
01107 
01108    // template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T, 
01109    // Vector<double>&, 
01110    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
01111    // Vector<double>&, Vector<double>&, 
01112    // double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01113    // double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01114    // double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01115    // double, double, double, double, double, double, int) method
01116  
01142 
01143    template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
01144    Vector<double>& xOut, 
01145    Vector<double>& y1Out, 
01146    Vector<double>& y2Out, 
01147    Vector<double>& y3Out, 
01148    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double), 
01149    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double), 
01150    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double), 
01151    double a, double b, 
01152    double y1a, double y2a, double y3a)
01153    {
01154       double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0;
01155 
01156       int count = 0;
01157 
01158       int size = initialSize;
01159 
01160       Vector<double> tempX(size);
01161       Vector<double> tempY1(size);
01162       Vector<double> tempY2(size);
01163 
01164       tempX[0] = a;
01165       tempY1[0] = y1a;
01166       tempY2[0] = y2a;
01167       count++;
01168 
01169       double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
01170 
01171       double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
01172       double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
01173       double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
01174       double a5 = 1.0;
01175       double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
01176 
01177       double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
01178       double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
01179       double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
01180       double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
01181       double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
01182       double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
01183       double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
01184       double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
01185       double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
01186       double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
01187       double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
01188       double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
01189       double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
01190       double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
01191       double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
01192 
01193       double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
01194       double c42 = 0.0;
01195       double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
01196       double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
01197       double c45 = 0.0;
01198       double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01199 
01200       double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01201       double c52 = 0.0;  
01202       double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01203       double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01204       double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01205       double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01206 
01207       double d1 = c41 - c51;
01208       double d2 = c42 - c52;
01209       double d3 = c43 - c53;
01210       double d4 = c44 - c54;
01211       double d5 = c45 - c55;
01212       double d6 = c46 - c56;
01213 
01214       double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0;
01215       double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0;
01216       double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0;
01217       double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0;
01218       double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0;
01219       double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0;
01220 
01221       // Main loop
01222 
01223       double x = a;
01224       double y1 = y1a;
01225       double y2 = y2a;
01226 
01227       double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01228 
01229       double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01230 
01231       while(x < b)
01232       {   
01233          // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01234 
01235          hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01236 
01237          if(h < hmin)
01238          {
01239             std::cout << std::endl
01240                       << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01241                       << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01242                       << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01243                      << std::endl;
01244 
01245             h = hmin;
01246          }
01247 
01248          if(x + h > b)
01249          {
01250             h = b - x;
01251          }
01252 
01253          // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01254 
01255          k11 = h*(t.*f1)(x, y1, y2);
01256          k21 = h*(t.*f2)(x, y1, y2);
01257 
01258          k12 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01259          k22 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21);
01260 
01261          k13 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01262          k23 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22);
01263 
01264          k14 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01265          k24 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23); 
01266 
01267          k15 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01268          k25 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24); 
01269 
01270          k16 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01271          k26 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25);
01272 
01273          // Error estimate
01274 
01275          error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01276          error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01277 
01278          error = 0.0;
01279 
01280          if(error1 > error)
01281          {
01282             error = error1;
01283          }
01284          if(error2 > error)
01285          {
01286             error = error2;
01287          }
01288 
01289          if(error <= tolerance)
01290          {
01291             x += h;
01292 
01293             y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01294             y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01295 
01296             tempX[count] = x;
01297             tempY1[count] = y1;
01298             tempY2[count] = y2;
01299 
01300             count++;
01301 
01302             if(error != 0.0)
01303             {
01304                h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01305             }
01306 
01307             if(count >= size)
01308             {
01309                size *= 2;
01310 
01311             if(size > errorSize)
01312             {
01313                   std::cerr << std::endl
01314                             << "Flood Error: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01315                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01316                             << "Step size is bigger than greatest allowable." << std::endl;
01317                             
01318                   exit(1);
01319             }
01320             else if(display && (size > warningSize))
01321             {
01322                   std::cout << std::endl
01323                             << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01324                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01325                             << "Size is " << size << std::endl;
01326             }
01327 
01328             tempX.resize(size);
01329                tempY1.resize(size);
01330                tempY2.resize(size);
01331             }
01332          }
01333          else
01334          {
01335             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
01336          }
01337       } // end while loop   
01338 
01339       Vector<double> newX(count);
01340       Vector<double> newY1(count);
01341       Vector<double> newY2(count);
01342 
01343       for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01344       {
01345          newX[i] = tempX[i];
01346          newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01347          newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01348       }
01349 
01350       xOut = newX;
01351       y1Out = newY1;
01352       y2Out = newY2;
01353    }
01354 
01355 
01356    // template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
01357    // Vector<double>& xOut, 
01358    // Vector<double>& y1Out, 
01359    // Vector<double>& y2Out, 
01360    // Vector<double>& y3Out, 
01361    // Vector<double>& y4Out, 
01362    // double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01363    // double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01364    // double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01365    // double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01366    // double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a) method
01367 
01397 
01398    template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
01399    Vector<double>& xOut, 
01400    Vector<double>& y1Out, 
01401    Vector<double>& y2Out, 
01402    Vector<double>& y3Out, 
01403    Vector<double>& y4Out, 
01404    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01405    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01406    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01407    double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double), 
01408    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a)
01409    {
01410       double error = 0.0, error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0, error3 = 0.0, error4 = 0.0;
01411 
01412       int count = 0;
01413 
01414      int size = initialSize;
01415 
01416       Vector<double> tempX(size);
01417       Vector<double> tempY1(size);
01418       Vector<double> tempY2(size);
01419       Vector<double> tempY3(size);
01420       Vector<double> tempY4(size);
01421 
01422       tempX[0] = a;
01423 
01424       tempY1[0] = y1a;
01425       tempY2[0] = y2a;
01426       tempY3[0] = y3a;
01427       tempY4[0] = y4a;
01428 
01429       count++;
01430 
01431       double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
01432 
01433       double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
01434       double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
01435       double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
01436       double a5 = 1.0;
01437       double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
01438 
01439       double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
01440       double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
01441       double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
01442       double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
01443       double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
01444       double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
01445       double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
01446       double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
01447       double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
01448       double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
01449       double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
01450       double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
01451       double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
01452       double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
01453       double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
01454 
01455       double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
01456       double c42 = 0.0;
01457       double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
01458       double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
01459       double c45 = 0.0;
01460       double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01461 
01462       double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01463       double c52 = 0.0;  
01464       double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01465       double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01466       double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01467       double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01468 
01469       double d1 = c41 - c51;
01470       double d2 = c42 - c52;
01471       double d3 = c43 - c53;
01472       double d4 = c44 - c54;
01473       double d5 = c45 - c55;
01474       double d6 = c46 - c56;
01475 
01476       double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0, k31 = 0.0, k41 = 0.0;
01477       double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0, k32 = 0.0, k42 = 0.0;
01478       double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0, k33 = 0.0, k43 = 0.0;
01479       double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0, k34 = 0.0, k44 = 0.0;
01480       double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0, k35 = 0.0, k45 = 0.0;
01481       double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0, k36 = 0.0, k46 = 0.0;
01482 
01483       // Main loop
01484 
01485       double x = a;
01486       double y1 = y1a;
01487       double y2 = y2a;
01488       double y3 = y3a;
01489       double y4 = y4a;
01490 
01491       double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01492 
01493       double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01494 
01495       while(x < b)
01496       {
01497          // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01498 
01499          hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01500 
01501          if(h < hmin)
01502          {
01503             std::cout << std::endl
01504                       << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01505                       << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01506                       << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01507                       << std::endl;
01508 
01509             h = hmin;
01510          }
01511 
01512          if(x + h > b)
01513          {
01514             h = b - x;
01515          }
01516 
01517          // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01518 
01519          k11 = h*(t.*f1)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01520          k21 = h*(t.*f2)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01521          k31 = h*(t.*f3)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01522          k41 = h*(t.*f4)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4);
01523 
01524          k12 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01525          k22 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01526          k32 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01527          k42 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41);
01528 
01529          k13 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01530          k23 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01531          k33 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01532          k43 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42);
01533 
01534          k14 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01535          k24 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01536          k34 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01537          k44 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43); 
01538 
01539          k15 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01540          k25 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01541          k35 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01542          k45 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44); 
01543 
01544        k16 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01545        k26 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01546          k36 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01547          k46 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45);
01548 
01549          // Error estimate
01550 
01551          error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01552          error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01553          error3 = fabs(d1*k31+d2*k32+d3*k33+d4*k34+d5*k35+d6*k36);
01554          error4 = fabs(d1*k41+d2*k42+d3*k43+d4*k44+d5*k45+d6*k46);
01555 
01556          error = 0.0;
01557 
01558          if(error1 > error)
01559          {
01560             error = error1;
01561          }
01562          if(error2 > error)
01563          {
01564             error = error2;
01565          }
01566          if(error3 > error)
01567          {
01568             error = error3;
01569          }
01570          if(error4 > error)
01571          {
01572             error = error4;
01573          }
01574 
01575          if(error <= tolerance)
01576          {
01577             // Successful step
01578 
01579             x += h;
01580 
01581             y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01582             y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01583             y3 += c51*k31+c52*k32+c53*k33+c54*k34+c55*k35+c56*k36;
01584             y4 += c51*k41+c52*k42+c53*k43+c54*k44+c55*k45+c56*k46;
01585 
01586             tempX[count] = x;
01587             tempY1[count] = y1;
01588             tempY2[count] = y2;
01589             tempY3[count] = y3;
01590             tempY4[count] = y4;
01591 
01592             count++;
01593 
01594             if(error != 0.0)
01595             {
01596                h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01597             }
01598 
01599             if(count >= size)
01600             {
01601                // Not enouth memory reserved
01602 
01603                size *= 2;
01604 
01605             if(size > errorSize)
01606             {
01607                   std::cerr << std::endl
01608                             << "Flood Error: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01609                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01610                             << "Step size is bigger than greatest allowable." << std::endl;
01611                             
01612                   exit(1);
01613             }
01614             else if(display && (size > warningSize))
01615             {
01616                   std::cout << std::endl
01617                             << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01618                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01619                             << "Size is " << size << std::endl;
01620             }
01621 
01622                tempX.resize(size);
01623                tempY1.resize(size);
01624                tempY2.resize(size);
01625                tempY3.resize(size);
01626                tempY4.resize(size);
01627          }
01628          }
01629          else
01630          {
01631             // Failed step
01632 
01633             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
01634          }
01635       } // end while loop   
01636 
01637       Vector<double> newX(count);
01638       Vector<double> newY1(count);
01639       Vector<double> newY2(count);
01640       Vector<double> newY3(count);
01641       Vector<double> newY4(count);
01642 
01643       for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01644       {
01645          newX[i] = tempX[i];
01646          newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01647          newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01648          newY3[i] = tempY3[i];
01649          newY4[i] = tempY4[i];
01650       }
01651 
01652       xOut = newX;
01653       y1Out = newY1;
01654       y2Out = newY2;
01655       y3Out = newY3;
01656       y4Out = newY4;
01657 
01658       return(count);
01659    }
01660 
01661 
01662    // template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
01663    // Vector<double>& xOut, 
01664    // Vector<double>& y1Out, 
01665    // Vector<double>& y2Out, 
01666    // Vector<double>& y3Out, 
01667    // Vector<double>& y4Out, 
01668    // Vector<double>& y5Out, 
01669    // double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01670    // double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01671    // double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01672    // double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01673    // double (T::*f5)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01674    // double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a, double y5a) method
01675 
01709 
01710    template<class T> int calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(T& t, 
01711    Vector<double>& xOut, 
01712    Vector<double>& y1Out, 
01713    Vector<double>& y2Out, 
01714    Vector<double>& y3Out, 
01715    Vector<double>& y4Out, 
01716    Vector<double>& y5Out, 
01717    double (T::*f1)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01718    double (T::*f2)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01719    double (T::*f3)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01720    double (T::*f4)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01721    double (T::*f5)(double, double, double, double, double, double), 
01722    double a, double b, double y1a, double y2a, double y3a, double y4a, double y5a)
01723    {
01724       double error = 0.0;
01725 
01726      double error1 = 0.0, error2 = 0.0, error3 = 0.0, error4 = 0.0, error5 = 0.0;
01727 
01728       int count = 0;
01729 
01730      int size = initialSize;
01731 
01732       Vector<double> tempX(size);
01733       Vector<double> tempY1(size);
01734       Vector<double> tempY2(size);
01735       Vector<double> tempY3(size);
01736       Vector<double> tempY4(size);
01737       Vector<double> tempY5(size);
01738 
01739       tempX[0] = a;
01740 
01741       tempY1[0] = y1a;
01742       tempY2[0] = y2a;
01743       tempY3[0] = y3a;
01744       tempY4[0] = y4a;
01745       tempY5[0] = y5a;
01746 
01747       count++;
01748 
01749       double epsilon = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
01750 
01751       double a2 = 1.0/5.0;
01752       double a3 = 3.0/10.0;
01753       double a4 = 3.0/5.0;
01754       double a5 = 1.0;
01755       double a6 = 7.0/8.0;
01756 
01757       double b21 = 1.0/5.0;   
01758       double b31 = 3.0/40.0;
01759       double b32 = 9.0/40.0;   
01760       double b41 = 3.0/10.0;
01761       double b42 = -9.0/10.0;   
01762       double b43 = 6.0/5.0; 
01763       double b51 = -11.0/54.0;
01764       double b52 = 5.0/2.0;
01765       double b53 = -70.0/27.0;
01766       double b54 = 35.0/27.0; 
01767       double b61 = 1631.0/55296.0;
01768       double b62 = 175.0/512.0;   
01769       double b63 = 575.0/13824.0;   
01770       double b64 = 44275.0/110592.0;   
01771       double b65 = 253.0/4096.0;
01772 
01773       double c41 = 37.0/378.0;
01774       double c42 = 0.0;
01775       double c43 = 250.0/621.0;
01776       double c44 = 125.0/594.0;
01777       double c45 = 0.0;
01778       double c46 = 512.0/1771.0;
01779 
01780       double c51 = 2825.0/27648.0;  
01781       double c52 = 0.0;  
01782       double c53 = 18575.0/48384.0;   
01783       double c54 = 13525.0/55296.0;
01784       double c55 = 277.0/14336.0;
01785       double c56 = 1.0/4.0;
01786 
01787       double d1 = c41 - c51;
01788       double d2 = c42 - c52;
01789       double d3 = c43 - c53;
01790       double d4 = c44 - c54;
01791       double d5 = c45 - c55;
01792       double d6 = c46 - c56;
01793 
01794       double k11 = 0.0, k21 = 0.0, k31 = 0.0, k41 = 0.0, k51 = 0.0;
01795       double k12 = 0.0, k22 = 0.0, k32 = 0.0, k42 = 0.0, k52 = 0.0;
01796       double k13 = 0.0, k23 = 0.0, k33 = 0.0, k43 = 0.0, k53 = 0.0;
01797       double k14 = 0.0, k24 = 0.0, k34 = 0.0, k44 = 0.0, k54 = 0.0;
01798       double k15 = 0.0, k25 = 0.0, k35 = 0.0, k45 = 0.0, k55 = 0.0;
01799       double k16 = 0.0, k26 = 0.0, k36 = 0.0, k46 = 0.0, k56 = 0.0;
01800 
01801       // Main loop
01802 
01803       double x = a;
01804       double y1 = y1a;
01805       double y2 = y2a;
01806       double y3 = y3a;
01807       double y4 = y4a;
01808       double y5 = y5a;
01809 
01810       double hmin = 16.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01811 
01812       double h = (b-a)*1.0e-3;
01813 
01814       while(x < b)
01815       {
01816          // Set smallest allowable stepsize
01817 
01818          hmin = 32.0*epsilon*fabs(x);
01819 
01820          if(h < hmin)
01821          {
01822             std::cout << std::endl
01823                       << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01824                       << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01825                       << "Step size is less than smallest allowable." << std::endl
01826                       << std::endl;
01827 
01828             h = hmin;
01829          }
01830 
01831          if(x + h > b)
01832          {
01833             h = b - x;
01834          }
01835 
01836          // Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg coefficients
01837 
01838          k11 = h*(t.*f1)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4, y5);
01839          k21 = h*(t.*f2)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4, y5);
01840          k31 = h*(t.*f3)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4, y5);
01841          k41 = h*(t.*f4)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4, y5);
01842          k51 = h*(t.*f5)(x, y1, y2, y3, y4, y5);
01843 
01844          k12 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41, y5+b21*k51);
01845          k22 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41, y5+b21*k51);
01846          k32 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41, y5+b21*k51);
01847          k42 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41, y5+b21*k51);
01848          k52 = h*(t.*f5)(x+a2*h, y1+b21*k11, y2+b21*k21, y3+b21*k31, y4+b21*k41, y5+b21*k51);
01849 
01850          k13 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42, y5+b31*k51+b32*k52);
01851          k23 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42, y5+b31*k51+b32*k52);
01852          k33 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42, y5+b31*k51+b32*k52);
01853          k43 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42, y5+b31*k51+b32*k52);
01854          k53 = h*(t.*f5)(x+a3*h, y1+b31*k11+b32*k12, y2+b31*k21+b32*k22, y3+b31*k31+b32*k32, y4+b31*k41+b32*k42, y5+b31*k51+b32*k52);
01855 
01856          k14 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43, y5+b41*k51+b42*k52+b43*k53); 
01857          k24 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43, y5+b41*k51+b42*k52+b43*k53); 
01858          k34 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43, y5+b41*k51+b42*k52+b43*k53); 
01859          k44 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43, y5+b41*k51+b42*k52+b43*k53); 
01860          k54 = h*(t.*f5)(x+a4*h, y1+b41*k11+b42*k12+b43*k13, y2+b41*k21+b42*k22+b43*k23, y3+b41*k31+b42*k32+b43*k33, y4+b41*k41+b42*k42+b43*k43, y5+b41*k51+b42*k52+b43*k53); 
01861 
01862          k15 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44, y5+b51*k51+b52*k52+b53*k53+b54*k54); 
01863          k25 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44, y5+b51*k51+b52*k52+b53*k53+b54*k54); 
01864          k35 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44, y5+b51*k51+b52*k52+b53*k53+b54*k54); 
01865          k45 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44, y5+b51*k51+b52*k52+b53*k53+b54*k54); 
01866          k55 = h*(t.*f5)(x+a5*h, y1+b51*k11+b52*k12+b53*k13+b54*k14, y2+b51*k21+b52*k22+b53*k23+b54*k24, y3+b51*k31+b52*k32+b53*k33+b54*k34, y4+b51*k41+b52*k42+b53*k43+b54*k44, y5+b51*k51+b52*k52+b53*k53+b54*k54); 
01867 
01868          k16 = h*(t.*f1)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45, y5+b61*k51+b62*k52+b63*k53+b64*k54+b65*k55);
01869          k26 = h*(t.*f2)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45, y5+b61*k51+b62*k52+b63*k53+b64*k54+b65*k55);
01870          k36 = h*(t.*f3)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45, y5+b61*k51+b62*k52+b63*k53+b64*k54+b65*k55);
01871          k46 = h*(t.*f4)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45, y5+b61*k51+b62*k52+b63*k53+b64*k54+b65*k55);
01872          k56 = h*(t.*f5)(x+a6*h, y1+b61*k11+b62*k12+b63*k13+b64*k14+b65*k15, y2+b61*k21+b62*k22+b63*k23+b64*k24+b65*k25, y3+b61*k31+b62*k32+b63*k33+b64*k34+b65*k35, y4+b61*k41+b62*k42+b63*k43+b64*k44+b65*k45, y5+b61*k51+b62*k52+b63*k53+b64*k54+b65*k55);
01873 
01874          // Error estimate
01875 
01876          error1 = fabs(d1*k11+d2*k12+d3*k13+d4*k14+d5*k15+d6*k16);
01877          error2 = fabs(d1*k21+d2*k22+d3*k23+d4*k24+d5*k25+d6*k26);
01878          error3 = fabs(d1*k31+d2*k32+d3*k33+d4*k34+d5*k35+d6*k36);
01879          error4 = fabs(d1*k41+d2*k42+d3*k43+d4*k44+d5*k45+d6*k46);
01880 
01881          error = 0.0;
01882 
01883          if(error1 > error)
01884          {
01885             error = error1;
01886          }
01887          if(error2 > error)
01888          {
01889             error = error2;
01890          }
01891          if(error3 > error)
01892          {
01893             error = error3;
01894          }
01895          if(error4 > error)
01896          {
01897             error = error4;
01898          }
01899          if(error5 > error)
01900          {
01901             error = error5;
01902          }
01903 
01904          if(error <= tolerance)
01905          {
01906             x += h;
01907 
01908             y1 += c51*k11+c52*k12+c53*k13+c54*k14+c55*k15+c56*k16;
01909             y2 += c51*k21+c52*k22+c53*k23+c54*k24+c55*k25+c56*k26;
01910             y3 += c51*k31+c52*k32+c53*k33+c54*k34+c55*k35+c56*k36;
01911             y4 += c51*k41+c52*k42+c53*k43+c54*k44+c55*k45+c56*k46;
01912             y5 += c51*k51+c52*k52+c53*k53+c54*k54+c55*k55+c56*k56;
01913 
01914             tempX[count] = x;
01915 
01916             tempY1[count] = y1;
01917             tempY2[count] = y2;
01918             tempY3[count] = y3;
01919             tempY4[count] = y4;
01920             tempY5[count] = y5;
01921 
01922             count++;
01923 
01924             if(error != 0.0)
01925             {
01926                h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.2);
01927             }
01928 
01929             if(count >= size)
01930             {
01931                // Not enought memory reserved 
01932                
01933                size *= 2;
01934 
01935             if(size > errorSize)
01936             {
01937                   std::cerr << std::endl
01938                             << "Flood Error: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01939                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01940                             << "Step size is bigger than greatest allowable." << std::endl;
01941                             
01942                   exit(1);
01943             }
01944             else if(display && (size > warningSize))
01945             {
01946                   std::cout << std::endl
01947                             << "Flood Warning: OrdinaryDifferentialEquations class." << std::endl
01948                             << "calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral() method." << std::endl
01949                             << "Size is " << size << std::endl;
01950             }
01951 
01952                tempX.resize(size);
01953                tempY1.resize(size);
01954                tempY2.resize(size);
01955                tempY3.resize(size);
01956                tempY4.resize(size);
01957                tempY5.resize(size);
01958          }
01959          }
01960          else
01961          {
01962             h *= 0.9*pow(fabs(tolerance/error),0.25);
01963          }
01964       } // end while loop   
01965 
01966       Vector<double> newX(count);
01967 
01968       Vector<double> newY1(count);
01969       Vector<double> newY2(count);
01970       Vector<double> newY3(count);
01971       Vector<double> newY4(count);
01972       Vector<double> newY5(count);
01973 
01974       for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01975       {
01976          newX[i] = tempX[i];
01977          newY1[i] = tempY1[i];
01978          newY2[i] = tempY2[i];
01979          newY3[i] = tempY3[i];
01980          newY4[i] = tempY4[i];
01981          newY5[i] = tempY5[i];
01982       }
01983 
01984       xOut = newX;
01985       y1Out = newY1;
01986       y2Out = newY2;
01987       y3Out = newY3;
01988       y4Out = newY4;
01989       y5Out = newY5;
01990 
01991      return(count);
01992    }
01993 
01994 };
01995 
01996 }
01997 
01998 #endif
